question: Please tell me When Harzat Aisha Married Prophet Mushammad (PHUB) her age is 9 12 or 13?
answer:
QUESTION

A-Salam

Please  tell me    When Harzat  Aisha   Married     Prophet Mushammad  (PHUB)  her  age is   9  12 or 13  because   some  place   code  9 or  some place  code  12 or 13.  

Thanks


Allah Hafiz

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Rasulullah Sallallahu alayhi wasallam married Ummul Mumineen Aisha Radiyallhu anha in the 10th year of Nabuwwat (i.e. at the age of 50).  At the time of marriage, Aisha Radiyallahu anha was 6 years old.  However, she moved out of her parent’s home at the age of 9 to live with Nabi Sallallahu alayhi wasallam.  

Nabi Sallallahu alayhi wasallam passed away at the age of 63 (i.e. when Aisha Radiyallahu anha was 18)

N.B. People ask many questions about Rasulullah (S.A.W.)’s marriages in general and in particular his marriage to Aysha (R.A.). These issues are discussed in detail elsewhere on this site.

 

And Allah knows best

Wassalam

A Female Iftaa Student
